name: Magic KinderGarten
description:
Take part in local gamejam(48h). Theme was speech recognition games.

Was working in team.

We made a game where you can cast spells, with you voice.

Code:d954mas, anisimovih

Art:Anna Matrosova

GD:lchesnokov

Only russian language.

Need android 8+
